description: These pulled chicken tostadas take no time at all and are a delicious addition to any Mexican feast.
keywords: Tortilla,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Avocado,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chipotle Chicken Tostadas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Place the chicken breasts on a sheet of foil and dust with chipotle seasoning. Fold the foil up around the chicken and add a couple of teaspoons of water. Seal the foil tightly. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes.
Remove from the oven and shred the chicken in a bowl with 2 forks. Heat the rest of the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the tortilas for 1 minute, flipping halfway through. Drain on kitchen paper.
Place the onions in a small bowl and cover with the juice of a lime. Leave to steep for 5 minutes.
Mash the avocado with lime juice and stir in the garlic. Spread each tostada with avocado, place shredded chicken on top. Scatter with jalapenos and red onions and serve.
